text.div:
HSPC Special Arrangement value set

The list of codes that describe how the data came into being.

Copyright Statement: Intermountain Healthcare HDD

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-specialArrangement defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
182850 Wheelchair A device, comprising a chair with wheels, used for individuals that cannot walk.
528123036 Interpreter An individual that translates spoken language to a language that is understood by the receiver.
182847 Stretcher A device used to convey an individual from one place to another where the individual is in a lying position and is carried by others.
528123037 Seeing eye dog A canine that has been trained to lead an idividual that is blind.
30719 Oxygen A suuplimental substance given to patients who cannot obtain appropriate level of environmental oxygen through natural breathing.
528123038 Heart monitor A device that monitors an idividual's heart rate.

name: HSPC Special Arrangement value set
description: The list of codes that describe how the data came into being.
